UVI.product_version: versions from v2.6.37 to before v4.9.271
UVI.description:
NFS: fix an incorrect limit in filelayout_decode_layout()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.271 by commit b287521e9e94bb342ebe5fd8c3fd7db9aef4e6f1, it was introduced in version v2.6.37 by commit 16b374ca439fb406e46e071f75428f5b033056f8. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: NFS: fix an incorrect limit in filelayout_decode_layout()
